data.actual_result: The text "connect to voice" has black text (incorrect) on it.
data.expected_result: The text "connect to voice" Should have white text
data.short_description: Incorrect font color on the blurple "connect to voice" button
data.steps_to_repro: - Go to any server having a voice channel - Click on the voice channel name to open up that channel screen, notice the new blurple button on the bottom saying "connect to voice" on it. - Notice the font color is black, now join the vc and in the voice settings select "push to talk" , go back and notice the button on the bottom saying "push to talk" with a white font written on.
